== Kubuntu Apps ==
This page is used to track inclusion of some flagship KDE applications that are released separately from KDE releases. Kubuntu developers are typically in good connection with upstream authors and follow these releases closely. Some upstream authors are also trying to align their release schedule with Ubuntu release schedule.

=== Packages you would like in Kubuntu? ===
If you are missing some important KDE application in Kubuntu, you may want to file a bug in Launchpad and tag it as `needs-packaging` and hope that some MOTU will package it.
